General.Name: Advanced Technology & Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Advanced Technology & Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and manufacture of metallic materials, products, and solutions in the People's Republic of China and internationally. Its products include rare earth permanent magnets; special alloys; amorphous and nano-crystalline materials and products; refractory materials and products; diamond tools, atomized alloy powders; metal injection molding parts; HIP products; steel tool and die; welding material; and environmental protection engineering. The company serves automobile, electronics, automation and drives, energy, medical technology, aerospace and ship, railway, environmental protection, and other industries. Advanced Technology & Materials Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 76, Xueyuan South Road, Beijing, China, 100081
